descriptionHtml:
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=8][b]UPDATES[/b][/size] 
[b][size=1]I recommand you to download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22646]Animated Female Idle for Mixed Armor[/url][/size][/b][/color]



[color=grey][size=2][b]Currently, it is a replacer version of Light Steel Armor (Standalone version will be available for the next updates).[/size][/b]



[b]Don\'t worry if you see some issues, just tell me what problems you see and i will fix them soon.[/b][/color]


[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Required Mods :[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url][/b][size=1] by dimon99[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Recommanded Mods :[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22646]Animated Female Idle for Mixed Armor[/url][/b][size=1] by Clepsa[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]


[size=1][color=grey]Hi, i\'m working on a new project what consists in mix a lot of existing armors in Skyrim.[/color][/size]


[color=grey]This armor is [/color][color=Lightslategray][b]now uploaded and downloadable[/b][/color].[color=grey]
I would like to know what you think about this and i would appreciate it if you could give me some feedback :[/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345186090-turn-around-miniature.jpg[/img]



[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345187666-descriptif.png[/img]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22473-5-1345037493.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22473-3-1345037492.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22473-2-1345037492.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22473-4-1345037492.jpg[/img]


Thanks you and see you soon for updates.
author: Clepsa

files.name: Mixed Armor Project - Mat Steel Pieces Version
